Description: Papyrus fragment with six lines of Coptic text written along the fibres and two againgst the fibres. Mounted with 10128, 10131, 10133-4, 10136, 10139.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380879) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380879)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
